control_attributes.Control: MA-6 (3) AUTOMATED SUPPORT FOR PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE
control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to transfer predictive maintenance data to a computerized maintenance management system.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of information stored on digital media during transport outside of controlled areas.

Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to transfer predictive maintenance data to a computerized maintenance management system.
Control Name: MA-6 (3) AUTOMATED SUPPORT FOR PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE
